name: The Perfect Concept
description:
The Perfect Concept



This is a short horror game, that delves into the mind of an indie game developer, trying to make the perfect horror game.
Games are extremely hard to make, and it's a miracle when they come to fruition, and gets released into the wild. But you have to ask yourself.

What would you do, to make the perfect horror game?

What would you sacrifice?

It all?

Gameplay


Explore the mind of an indie game developer through first person interaction, with terrifying scares that will leave a lasting impression.
